name: commonly

dsense.posTip: A word that describes or gives more information about a verb, adjective or other adverb.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 经常地；普通地；通常；一般

example.eg: Elbow injuries are commonly found among tennis players.
example.egtrans: 肘伤在网球运动员中很常见。
